"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS FOR CANDIDATES


  1. The candidate should follow the norms of social distancing and COVID guidelines as prescribed by Govt. of India , Govt. of Odisha and the local authorities as applicable from time to time .

  2. Candidate should reach the center 30 mins before the scheduled reporting time. Any candidate reporting after the scheduled reporting time will not be allowed to appear the test.

  3. Candidates should bring the following documents in original as well as one set of self-attested photocopy of the documents submitted earlier at the time of submission of Online Application Form (OAF) with them for verification during interview/skill test.

    • E- Admit Card for appearing {{doc.selection_round or "NA"}}

    • Online Application Form of WSC preferably in colour

    • 10th/HSC (Mandatory) and 10+2 Marks Sheet and Certificate (as applicable for the post)

    • Essential Qualification Documents [complete qualification documents]

    • Essential Experience Documents as submitted during filling the Online Application Form

    • Domicile/Resident Certificate (Compulsory for claiming reservation)

    • Caste Certificate (if applicable)

"}]
